        public static GNSResponseCode signatureAndACLCheck(String guid,

                                            throws InvalidKeyException,
                                                   InvalidKeySpecException,
                                                   SignatureException,
                                                   NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                   FailedDBOperationException,
                                                   UnsupportedEncodingException
        Does access and signature checking for a field in a guid.
        Parameters:
        guid - - the guid containing the field being accessed
        field - - the field being accessed (one of this or fields should be non-null)
        fields - - or the fields beig accessed (one of this or field should be non-null)
        accessorGuid - - the guid doing the access
        signature -
        message -
        access - - the type of access
        gnsApp -
        Returns:
        an GNSResponseCode
        Throws:
        InvalidKeyException
        InvalidKeySpecException
        SignatureException
        NoSuchAlgorithmException
        FailedDBOperationException
        UnsupportedEncodingException
